notes.note: The options on this menu are intended to improve accessibility. They may not work with all games, and some combinations of options may render the game unplayable. This is not an issue with the game or engine. For the best results when changing fonts, try to keep the text size the same as it originally was.

The options on this menu are intended to improve accessibility. They may not work with all games, and some combinations of options may render the game unplayable. This is not an issue with the game or engine. For the best results when changing fonts, try to keep the text size the same as it originally was.

segment.source: The options on this menu are intended to improve accessibility. They may not work with all games, and some combinations of options may render the game unplayable. This is not an issue with the game or engine. For the best results when changing fonts, try to keep the text size the same as it originally was.

notes.note: Press <esc> to exit console. Type help for help.\n
Press <esc> to exit console. Type help for help.

segment.source: Press <esc> to exit console. Type help for help.

notes.note: <python expression or statement>: run the expression or statement
<python expression or statement>: run the expression or statement

segment.source: <python expression or statement>: run the expression or statement

notes.note: load <slot>: loads the game from slot
load <slot>: loads the game from slot

segment.source: load <slot>: loads the game from slot

notes.note: save <slot>: saves the game in slot
save <slot>: saves the game in slot

segment.source: save <slot>: saves the game in slot

notes.note: reload: reloads the game, refreshing the scripts
reload: reloads the game, refreshing the scripts

segment.source: reload: reloads the game, refreshing the scripts

notes.note: watch <expression>: watch a python expression\n watch short: makes the representation of traced expressions short (default)\n watch long: makes the representation of traced expressions as is
watch <expression>: watch a python expression watch short: makes the representation of traced expressions short (default) watch long: makes the representation of traced expressions as is

segment.source: watch short: makes the representation of traced expressions short (default)
watch long: makes the representation of traced expressions as is

notes.note: short: Shorten the representation of objects on the console (default).
short: Shorten the representation of objects on the console (default).

segment.source: short: Shorten the representation of objects on the console (default).

notes.note: long: Print the full representation of objects on the console.
long: Print the full representation of objects on the console.

segment.source: long: Print the full representation of objects on the console.

notes.note: escape: Enables escaping of unicode symbols in unicode strings.
escape: Enables escaping of unicode symbols in unicode strings.

segment.source: escape: Enables escaping of unicode symbols in unicode strings.

notes.note: unescape: Disables escaping of unicode symbols in unicode strings and print it as is (default).
unescape: Disables escaping of unicode symbols in unicode strings and print it as is (default).

segment.source: unescape: Disables escaping of unicode symbols in unicode strings and print it as is (default).

The interactive director is not enabled here.
